Source.Name: cdemu-client
Source.Summary: Command line client for CDEmu Daemon
Source.Description:
This is cdemu-client, a simple command-line client for controlling CDEmu daemon. It is part of the userspace-cdemu suite, a free, GPL CD/DVD-ROM device emulator for linux.
It provides a way to perform the key tasks related to controlling the CDEmu daemon, such as loading and unloading devices, displaying devices' status and retrieving/setting devices' debug masks.
